## 🎃 Hacktoberfest 2025 Contribution

### 📝 Description
What would you like to contribute to HordVoice?

### 🎯 Type of Contribution
- [ ] 🐛 Bug fix
- [ ] ✨ New feature
- [ ] 📚 Documentation improvement
- [ ] 🎨 UI/UX enhancement
- [ ] 🔧 Code refactoring
- [ ] 🌐 Localization/Translation
- [ ] 🧪 Tests
- [ ] 🚀 Performance improvement
- [ ] ♿ Accessibility improvement

### 🛠️ Technical Stack
Which areas will your contribution touch?
- [ ] Flutter/Dart
- [ ] Azure AI Services
- [ ] Android Native (Kotlin)
- [ ] Voice Recognition
- [ ] Natural Language Processing
- [ ] UI/UX Design
- [ ] Documentation

### 📋 Checklist
- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I understand this is for Hacktoberfest 2025
- [ ] My contribution will be meaningful and add value
- [ ] I'm prepared to maintain my contribution

### 🎯 Difficulty Level
- [ ] 🟢 Beginner (Good for first-time contributors)
- [ ] 🟡 Intermediate (Some Flutter/AI experience needed)
- [ ] 🔴 Advanced (Deep Azure AI/Voice processing knowledge required)

---

## 🤝 For Maintainers
- [ ] Assign appropriate labels
- [ ] Validate contribution scope
- [ ] Provide guidance if needed
- [ ] Ensure Hacktoberfest quality standards
